title: Daredevil, Vol. 14: The Devil, Inside and Out, Vol. 1
description: For the past few years, Matt Murdock's life has been teetering on the edge of destruction. Now, pushed beyond the limit, Matt finds himself behind the eight ball with no clear way out, the people he calls friends slowly deserting him, and Hell's Kitchen gradually slipping out of control.Collecting: Daredevil 82-87
author: Ed Brubaker
